
# GoCardLess 
![gocardless](https://static.openfintech.io/vendors/gocardless/logo.svg?w=400&c=v0.59.26#w200)  

## General 
 
**Code:** `gocardless` 
 
**Name:** 
 
:	[EN] GoCardLess 
 
**Status:** `active` 
 
**Description:** 
 
: [EN]  A simple way to take recurring payments. GoCardless makes collecting by Direct Debit easy for everyone from individuals to large cooperations at ultra low fees of just 1% per transaction. Join over 25,000 businesses that have processed over 1.5bn and make sure you get paid on time every time.  
 
 
**Countries:** 
 
:	![AU](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/au.svg#w24) 	![BE](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/be.svg#w24) 	![FR](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/fr.svg#w24) 	![DE](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/de.svg#w24) 	![IS](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/is.svg#w24) 	![ES](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/es.svg#w24) 	![SE](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/se.svg#w24) 	![AE](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/ae.svg#w24)  
**Contacts:**
